period.name: period
period.description: The reporting period for EPS revisions (e.g., Q1 2024, FY 2023).

up_last7days.name: up_last7days
up_last7days.description: Number of analysts who have increased their EPS estimates in the last 7 days.

up_last30days.name: up_last30days
up_last30days.description: Number of analysts who have increased their EPS estimates in the last 30 days.

down_last30days.name: down_last30days
down_last30days.description: Number of analysts who have decreased their EPS estimates in the last 30 days.

down_last7_days.name: down_last7_days
down_last7_days.description: Number of analysts who have decreased their EPS estimates in the last 7 days.

ticker.name: ticker
ticker.description: Stock ticker symbol associated with the EPS revision data.
